nodes.bodyText: I do not have context about why this check is there. The main focus of this PR is to add error handling, providing response for each error that is caught, and make the error response standard. Hence, I did not change the check. Anyways we are going to rewrite the git2pantheon later, we can make discuss it in a JIRA  related to that. Sounds good?
